item.description: Interactive Trivia, Jeopardy Style, buzz in your response to questions asked by your host. Game is fast paced, thought provoking and challenging, requires some strategy. So if you are tired of writing your answers on a piece of paper and having to wait for your score to be tallied come check us out Wednesday Nights at the Rosebud. We play 4 rounds with a winner each round and a grand prize for overall points winner at the end of the night. So come on down and see what it is all about.
item.name: Wednesday Night Interactive Game Show Style Trivia
